Articles.Content:
So, inspired by -

> 
> My first attempt at a 1.04 SSTO. While there isn't anything groundbreaking in the design, I was fairly pleased with how it came out.
> [http://i.imgur.com/ecDiPtr.png](http://i.imgur.com/ecDiPtr.png)
> 
> [http://imgur.com/a/VfUUT](http://imgur.com/a/VfUUT)
> 
> 66 tons, 132 parts without cargo. So far it can take about 10 tons to LKO, and I suspect more, if you can fit it in the bay and pilot well.
> 
> Enjoy!

- last night I tried one more time with "low" tech to build my SSTO (100.6 tons; the design uses 8 Whiplash and 4 experimental Aerospikes, with a 909 for final rounding and de-orbit), and Made it! ...except, for the flat-spin on re-entry that caused the 4 inline intercoolers to over-heat and explode, resulting in a parachute landing about 3000km from KSC. I suppose its not really an SSTO if it lands with less parts than it took off with, right? Tweaking of the base model will occur, and a second attempt will be made tonight. I think key is setting the Mk2-Mk1 forward LF as a non-draw reserve for balance.

However, Murphy's Law would have it; after 10, "artful, aesthetic" designs, the one I threw together that looks like a collapsed Pipe Organ is the one that works... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

If a further test is successful, I will see about posting in the K-Prize section- this has certainly caused enough angst & time expenditure to warrant trying for the badge! - Special thanks to Slashy, whose postings on SSTO philosophy were very helpful.

Nah, its still an SSTO, you made it to orbit in one piece!

Its just not a SSTOAB... Orbit And Back.

You're still on 1.02?

I made lots of SSTOs in 1.02 without rapiers... Turboramjets are pretty good too
Shift all your fuel to the front tanks before you re-enter. Helps keep it in balance usually.

> 
> Nah, its still an SSTO, you made it to orbit in one piece!
> Its just not a SSTOAB... Orbit And Back.
> 
> You're still on 1.02?

SSTOAB- heh, I like that. :] My fault for not telling the guys in Engineering to be more specific. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Yes, wanted to finish my 1.02 game before upgrading, also hoping the Launcher will eventually do it automatically for me...

1.04 SSTO:

Mk1 command pod, 2xFL-T800 fuel tanks, 1xT45 engine. (ETA: Oops, and 3x basic fins)

Mind you, a spaceplane is harder. Let us know when you're ready to try one of those.
